description: The scheme, which a minister called a "sticking plaster", clearly acknowledged issues, an MHK says.
title: Isle of Man summer meal vouchers 'show failings in benefits system'
title_page: Isle of Man summer meal vouchers 'show failings in benefits system' - BBC News
maintext: She added that although "no child on our island should go hungry, and no parent should have to go without food to feed their children", work needed to be done to establish "whether there's a problem" and "how to target any help".
